articles.title: Mass Die-Off of Penguins Caused by 2019 Heat Wave, Study Says
articles.description: The extreme heat event killed hundreds of penguins in Argentina.
articles.content:
Extreme heat events can have a deadly impact on people and wildlife, as evidenced by a summer heat wave in 2019 that killed hundreds of penguins in Argentina, according to a new study.
When the temperature rose to 111.2 degrees Fahrenheit (44 Celsius... [3971 chars]

articles.title: Rallying-Al Attiyah stretches Dakar lead amid tightened security
articles.description: The seventh stage around the Saudi capital Riyadh, with the event under heightened security after an explosion in Jeddah last week, was won by Loeb's Bahrain Raid Xtreme team mate Orlando Terranova of Argentina. Audi's Mattias Ekstroem was second and Al Rajhi third for the Overdrive Toyota team.
articles.content: Nasser Al Attiyah stretched his Dakar Rally lead to 48 minutes on Friday with Saudi Arabia's Yazeed Al Rajhi replacing Sebastien Loeb as the Qatari's closest rival in the car category. The seventh stage around the Saudi capital Riyadh, with the event... [1961 chars]

articles.title: ATP Cup: Hubert Hurkacz died in a murderous clash!
articles.description: The Biało-Czerwoni led by Marcin Matkowski are doing very well on the courts in Sydney. They advanced to the semi-finals with a full set of victories. On Wednesday, the Poles defeated Argentina, and Hurkacz himself dealt with Diego Schwartzman in great style, winning 6: 1 and 6: 4. – I played a very good match …

articles.title: The women filling jails in Argentina for drug offences - a photo essay
articles.description: Nearly half the female prisoners in Argentina are serving time for drug possession. Photographer Magalí Druscovich visited the Unit 47 prison in Buenos Aires to find out their stories
articles.content: Paola left her home when she was 13 to escape abuse and violence. She lived on the streets for five years until she became pregnant. Her boyfriend left her when he found out. Without work and food, Paola agreed to deal drugs for a neighbourhood kingp... [5361 chars]
